item.description:
“Resident Evil” is no longer playing in the area.

When the viewing date was pushed back by two weeks

This was an expected possibility.   I wanted to see “Dredd”

But that is no longer in the area either.

I wanted to see “Solomon Kane” but it did not

Play anywhere in the area.

We can decide at the 6 p.m.  Meet Up on what to go see.

Here are the possibilities.

“House  at the End of the Street”  8:10

I already saw this.  Who and what is the killer?

“End of Watch”  7:35     Do not know?

“Looper”  7:55    A Time Traveler has to kill himself.

Bruce Willis stars.

“Hotel Transylvania”  7:25    Vampire and other Monsters cartoon.

“Taken 2”  7:05   I did not even see the first one.  An Agent gets revenge

On some killers who killed members of his family.  The previews

Showed that he daughter was taken.

“Pitch Perfect” 7:50   I do not know.

“Frankenweenie”  7:10  Some members have shown an interest

In this movie.  Kid brings his dead dog back to moving again.

Others want dead things back to moving again.

“Sinister”  7:00  Another haunted house story.

I might see this later on myself if no members

Are interested in seeing it.

“Here Comes the Boom”  7:15  Do not know.

“Argo”  7:30  CIA hires director to make a film in Iran to successfully

Help prisoners to escape.  This is based on a real story.  A few days

Ago I watched a few minutes of an interview with those who

Were really involved with this operation.

“Seven Psychopaths”  8:15  I do not know.

 

 

****************************************************

We will meet at Starbucks for coffee at 6pm,

Starbucks is with in the Barnes & Noble near Rave Motion Pictures.

Mike, the organizer, and a few other members might  enjoy going out to dinner

after the movie, so if you are interested in going out to dinner after,

feel free to join them.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Starbucks Coffee area at the Barnes & Noble in North Haven.
item.name: Coffee at Barnes & Noble and then the Movie to be Chosen
